item.title: bikestream
item.description: Bikestream 2021-09-03 Here are some notes on the bikestream project.

item.title: NILS V2.0
item.description: NILS V2.0 Here is my preliminary notes and work on an update to Nested Inter-Linkage Systems (NILS) . I will be writing V2.X updates in chunks rather than one finished essay. Send your feedback to my Twitter account. 2021-09-21 Name I am thinking of changing the name to Networked-trust Cooperatives (NTCs). 2021-09-17 Identity cooperatives Two possible Identity cooperatives I have thought of are: Reputation Feeds, and Digital Twins.
